title: Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 3 - Hajimari no Kiseki
original_name: テイルズ オブ ザ ワールド レディアント マイソロジー 3 はじまりの軌跡
sinopse: A short prequel to Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology, showing the formation of the guild Ad Libitum released as a bonus for those who pre-ordered the game Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 3.
